help.description: Get help about all available commands on the bot. If an argument is surrounded by {}, means that its required. Else if its surrounded by [], means that its optional

configure.description: Configure the bot how ever you want for this guild.

music.song_display_limit_change: {0} changed the songs display limit to {1}

guildinfo.description: Get relevant information about this guild.

kick.description: Kick a user for no reason if you want.

ban.description: Ban a user permanently or for a period of time.

mute.description: Mute a user permanently or for a period of time.

history.description:
Show the punishment history of a user. Ordered in chronological order.
Shows the latest punishments. You can also enter the amount of punishments to display.

clear.description: Clear messages from a text channel.

play.description: Play the music you want from YouTube either by typing the song name or using the song's url. Or play music from Soundcloud, Vimeo, or Mixer

select_song.title: Select a song by saying the number you want in the chat!
select_song.footer: You have {0} seconds to choose a song. Type 'cancel' to cancel the selection.
select_song.cancelled: The song selection has been canceled!

play.empty_queue: The queue is now empty, play more songs to continue listening to music.

skip.description: You don't like a song? Skip it then.

queue.description: Hmmm... wanna know what's the song list? :thinking:

fortnite.description: Get your or someone else's fortnite statistics.

botinfo.description: Show information about the nobody knows

disabled.global: This command has been disabled by the developer.
disabled.local: This command is disabled in this guild.

done_before.is_muted: This member has already been muted.

not_found.user: Could not find any user argument. Please tag a user or enter the user's ID.
not_found.mute_role: No Mute role found. Please go to the Official Website.
not_found.song: No songs were found. Please try again!
not_found.player: Music player not found on this guild!

punishments.for_user: No punishments found for the user {0}

not_found.data: I could not find any data.

invalid.number: You need to enter a valid number!
invalid.option: {0} is not valid. Please enter one of these {1}

gamemode.fortnite: Gamemode {0} not valid. Valid GameModes are [SOLO, DUO, or SQUAD]

errors.no_perms: You do not have the right permissions to do that.
errors.same_rank_or_higher: You cannot do this to a user who has the same rank or higher.
errors.self_punish: You cannot do this to your self.
errors.wrong_usage: That's not how it's done. Let me show you!
errors.times_up: Time is up! You didn't chose any song.
errors.queue_limit: There is a limit of {0} songs, you cannot add more until a space is free.
errors.user_not_voice_channel: You must be in a voice channel to do this!
errors.track_list: There was an error trying to get a track list, please try again!
errors.no_songs_queue: There are no song in the queue!

bans.new_ban: A user has been banned from the server.

kicks.new_kick: A user has been banned from the server.

mute.new_mute: A user has been muted from the server.
